readable.title: 3490736665_38710f4b91
readable.content: A big dog stands on his hand leg as tennis balls are thrown his direction . A brown and white dog in front of a shed overwhelmed by the onslaught of tennis balls . A brown and white dogs stands in front of a wooden building while tennis balls fly through the air . A dog jumps for several tennis balls thrown at him . A dog stands on his hind legs amid a shower of tennis balls .
